tool_description: Find out all the Australian  suburbs using postcode.
name: Australian postcode to suburb
title: Australian postcode to suburb

api_list.name: Get all suburbs and postcodes in a radius
api_list.description: This endpoint takes your epic centre latitude, longitude along with radius in KM and returns all postcodes and suburbs within it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com/radius/-33.86885141/151.2093319/25"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com/radius/{lat}/{lng}/{radius}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a list of states
api_list.description: This endpoint return 3 letter states for the passed postcode.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com/states/2000"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com/states/{postcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a list of suburbs
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all matching suburbs for the passed postcode. The response also includes the state for each suburb and, if available, latitude and longitude for the suburb.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com/suburbs/2000"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com/suburbs/{postcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "australian-postcode-to-suburb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
